name: Amazing repair
description:
The plot of the game tells us the story of a simple pensioner who went for a walk through a built-up city.

Amazing repair is a 2D platformer with a side view, the task is to get to the door while avoiding falling blocks from above, as well as using them to build a path to the cherished goal.

Features:
-30 challenging levels
-Pixel graphics
- Harmonic soundtrack
